PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.TITLE: Payment method
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.SUBTITLE: Please, fill all the fields to do the payment
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.CARD_NUMBER_MIN: - The card number must be at least 13 characters long
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.CARD_NUMBER_MAX: - The card number cannot exceed 20 characters long
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.CARD_ONLY_NUMBER: - The field must have only numbers
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.CARD_NUMBER_REQUIRED: - The card number cannot be empty
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.SECURITY_CODE_MIN: - The code must be at least 1 character long
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.SECURITY_CODE_MAX: - The code cannot exceed 4 characters long
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.CODE_ONLY_NUMBER: - The field must have only numbers
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.SECURITY_CODE_REQUIRED: - The code number cannot be empty
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.EMAIL_MIN: - The email must be at least 6 characters long
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.EMAIL_MAX: - The email cannot exceed 255 characters long
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.DNI_NUMBER_MAX: The dni cannot exceed 20 characters long
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.ADDRESS_MAX: The address cannot exceed 100 characters long
PAYU_PAYMENT_FORM.PHONE_NUMBER_MAX: The phone number cannot exceed 20 characteres long
